cards.rules_text: Add two mana in any combination of colors.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Super Mario deals 2 damage to any target.[/i]
cards.special_text:
[+2]: Add two mana in any combination of colors.
[+1]: Super Mario deals 2 damage to any target.
[-2]: Untap up to two permanents. Draw a card.
[-5]: Up to three creatures you control have indestructible, vigilance, and protection from creatures until end of turn.

cards.rules_text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, exile target nonland permanent, then return it to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step. Kirby becomes a copy of a card exiled this way for as long as it remains exiled, except it's a 1/1 green, white and blue Shapeshifter named Kirby with this ability. Then if the exiled card is a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on Kirby.

Menace, Haste, Trample
Whenever Bowser is blocked by a creature with power 2 or less, that creatures controller sacrifices it at the end of combat.
Final Smash: Giga Bowser Punch! [i](You may have Giga Bowser Punch! as a signature spell if this creature is your commander.)[/i]

[i]Finisher[/i] — Cast this spell only if you control your commander and your commander did combat damage this turn.
Target commander gets +10/+10 until end of turn, then fights up to four creatures you don't control. For each creature destroyed this way, that creatures controller discards two cards.

At the beginning of your upkeep, Grow a Tree 1. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on a Tree you control. If you don't control a Tree, create a 0/0 green Tree creature token with Defender first.)[/i]
{2}{W}, {T}, Sacrifice a Tree: The Villager deals damage equal to that Trees power to target attacking or blocking creature.
Final Smash: Dream Home!

[i]Finisher[/i] — Cast this spell only if you control your commander and you sacrificed one or more Trees this turn.
Destroy target nonland permanent. Its controller creates a 0/5 white House creature token with Defender.

First strike, haste
{X}{R}{R}, Put X stun counters on Captain Falcon: Captain Falcon gains twice +X/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only during combat on your turn.
Final Smash: Blue Falcon! [i](You may have Blue Falcon! as a signature spell if this creature is your commander.)[/i]

[i]Finisher[/i] — Cast this spell only if you control your commander and your commander did combat damage this turn.
Create a 7/7 vehicle artifact creature token with vigilance, trample, Crew 2 and “This creature gets +1/+1 for each excess power used to crew it”.

[i]Judge![/i] — Whenever Mr. Game & Watch attacks, roll a d10.
[b]1-4 [/b]| Mr. Game & Watch and target creature both get -1/-1 until end of turn.
[b]5-7 | [/b]Put two -1/-1 counters on target creature and a +1/+1 counter on Mr. Game & Watch.[b]
[b]8-9 [/b]| [/b]Destroy target creature.[b]
[b]10 [/b]| [/b]Roll again.[b]
[/b]Final Smash: Octopus!

[i]Finisher[/i] — Cast this spell only if you control your commander and you rolled a 6 or higher this turn.
Create an 8/8 blue Octopus creature token, then choose one —
• Tap up to three creatures and put a stun counter on each of them.
• Return up to three creatures to their owner's hand.

Haste, Vigilance
Whenever Samus attacks, choose one —
• Samus becomes a 1/1 artifact creature named Morph Ball with “This creature can't be blocked” until end of turn.
• Samus deals 2 damage to any target.
• Put a +1/+1 counter on Samus.
Final Smash: Zero Laser!

[i]Finisher[/i] — Cast this spell only if you control your commander and your commander did 7 or more total damage this turn.
Choose a player, then choose one —
• Zero Laser! deals twice X damage to up to X creatures that player controls and X damage to that player.
• Exile up to X creatures that player controls.

Double strike, haste
Prowess
{U}{R}, {T}: Zero-Suit Samus deals damage equal to her power to any target. If a creature is dealt damage this way, tap it and put a stun counter on it.
Final Smash: Zero Laser!

Whenever Pac-Man attacks, you may put a Pellet counter on target creature. If you do, Pac-Man fights that creature. If that creature dies this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Pac-Man.
{3}, {T}: Create a Fire Hydrant artifact token with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this token: Return target creature to its owners hand.”.
Final Smash: Super Pac Man!

[i]Finisher[/i] — Cast this spell only if you control your commander and if three or more creatures left the battlefield this turn.
Target commander gets +4/+4, then deals damage equal to its power to up to four creatures. For each creature destroyed this way, put three +1/+1 counters on the chosen commander and you draw a card.

Vigilance, Flash
Whenever Dark Samus attacks, choose one —
• Dark Samus becomes a 1/1 artifact creature named Morph Ball with “This creature can't be blocked” and Toxic 1 until end of turn.
• Draw a card, then discard a card unless you pay 2 life.
• Proliferate.
Final Smash: Phazon Laser!

Menace, Vigilance Trample, Haste
Whenever Dry Bowser deals combat damage to a player, Incubate X times or put X +1/+1 counters on each token creature you control, where X is the damage dealt. [i](To incubate X, create an Incubator token with X +1/+1 counters on it and “{2}: Transform this artifact.” It transforms into a 0/0 Phyrexian artifact creature.)[/i]

[i]Finisher[/i] — Cast this spell only if you control your commander and more than four counters were put on players or permanents this turn.
Choose a player, then choose one —
• Destroy up to X creatures.
• Proliferate X times, then deal damage equal to the number of counters on target permanent or player to another target permanent or player.
